thread.title: AirGrub Expanding Restaurant Options at SFO
thread.title_full: AirGrub Expanding Restaurant Options at SFO - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: AirGrub Expanding Restaurant Options at SFO
text:
AirGrub
Free airport food ordering app now available at Klein's Deli & Andale Mexican Restaurant
MILLBRAE, Calif. and SAN FRANCISCO , Aug. 26, Klein's Deli and Andale Mexican Restaurant at San Francisco International (SFO) have partnered with AirGrub to support the mobile ordering app at their locations in Terminal 3 and International G.
AirGrub brings peace of mind to travelers in the hectic airport environment. "We are very pleased to add these four new local airport food locations to our service so travelers and employees can get great food without the wait," says Surya Panditi, CEO of AirGrub.
Klein's specializes in making sandwiches (named after local SF neighborhoods), salads and a breakfast menu featuring Flying Goat Coffee. "Our customers are often short of time and airline or airport employees don't want to spend their break time waiting in line, even a fast moving one. By partnering with AirGrub we make their experience better by making it faster," says Avery McGinn , owner of Klein's Deli.
Andale maintains a family operated kitchen that offers burritos, Mexican street snacks, tacos and other recipes that have been handed down from generations of the founding families' abuelitas. "Andale has experience with food ordering apps in our 'street' restaurants and we are pleased to see that AirGrub has solved the issues unique to an airport environment," says Pedro Alvarez , Owner of Andale Mexican Restaurant.
The app is available on iTunes and Google Play.
The app also honors airport and airline employee discounts.
About Klein's Deli: At Klein's Deli we pride ourselves on neighborly service. We're known for hearty sandwiches, fresh salads, outstanding coffee and scrumptious baked goods. Stop by and we'll prepare something for your flight or for you to sit and enjoy at the deli while waiting to board.
About Andale Mexican Restaurant: At Andale we are proud to maintain the tradition of operating a family kitchen with our unique ability to present our Mexican Culture and food experience.
About AirGrub: AirGrub is a Silicon Valley based start-up with an app for travelers to pre- order and pick up freshly prepared food without waiting in line at the airport. AirGrub allows travelers to get Real Food when they Fly .
